name: Cursed (itch) (hanasoojin, QuintenBastin, Mathias Tossens, lerichem, sulvijans)
name_original: Cursed (itch) (hanasoojin, QuintenBastin, Mathias Tossens, lerichem, sulvijans)
description:
Story

You are a druid, exploring the depths of a magical forest, accompanied by your companion. The dark magician, the heir of the forest, cursed your companion, causing it to slowly become more and more monstrous and violent.  Beware of the shadows, as they will trigger the curse.

Will you be able to overcome the obstacles upon your path and save your companion? Controls Developed by:
  • Mathias Tossens ( level decoration, VFX, creature animation, SFX)
  • Sulvijan Sundaramoorthy (Creatures, level decoration)
  • Hana Stoffels (Character, character animation, UI)
  • Quinten Bastin (Programing, gameplay, SFX)
  • Maxime Leriche (Programing, gameplay, AI)
Music composed by: Bart Delvaux
